price: 98. Nabiyow keenik ixxic:kitab maraw (yahuud kee Nasaara kinnuk) Yallih Aayootay (Qhuraan kinnuk) Nabii Mucammadal ﷺ obtey Yallih diini islaam diini kinnim tascassee macah tangaddeenii? Isin Aaxaguk, Yalli isin Abba haytaanam yabali kinni.
arabic: قُلۡ يَٰٓأَهۡلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لِمَ تَكۡفُرُونَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَٱللَّهُ شَهِيدٌ عَلَىٰ مَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qul yāahla al-kitābi lima takfurūna biāyāti al-lahi wal-lahu shahīdun ʿalā mā taʿmalūna
